attributes.action: increase his contactability by providing an email address
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
plenty of people have no webcam by which means to contact him via youtube, plenty cannot get out to post a letter to him, thanks to disability, lack of public transport in rural areas etc.
 The prime minister should be able to be contacted by the citizens of the UK in as many ways as are possible. Currently it is not possible to email him and this needs to be addressed otherwise it looks as though he simply doesn't want to be contacted easily.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
